All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Arc
The class is a data class, modelling an arc.
BoundednessAnalysisResult
The class is a data class.
GraphController
The class implements the applications main controller.
GraphStreamPetrinet
The class is an implementation of the interface IPetrinetView using the GraphStream library (it derives from MultiGraph) to display a Petri net graph.
GraphStreamReachabilityGraph
The class is an implementation of the interface IReachabilityGraphView using the GraphStream library (it derives from MultiGraph) to display a reachability graph.
GSPetrinetViewerListener
The class implements the GraphStream interface ViewerListener, to handle click-events on a GraphStreamPetrinet with which the listener is registered.
GSReachabilityViewerListener
The class implements the GraphStream interface ViewerListener, to handle click-events on a GraphStreamReachabilityGraph with which the listener is registered.
IPetrinet
The interface provides methods to build a Petri net, retrieve data from the Petri net and change its marking.
IPetrinetAppView
The interface serves as the main interface of the application's view.
IPetrinetController
The interface provides the methods of the controller, which can be called by the view.
IPetrinetView
The interface provides methods to display a Petrinet.
IReachabilityGraph
The interface provides methods to build a reachability graph, get a collection of markings in the graph and a collection of outgoing edges for a given marking in the graph.
IReachabilityGraphView
The interface provides methods to display a reachability graph.
ITextView
The Interface provides methods to display text messages.
Marking
The class is a data class storing a marking of a Petri net.
Menu
The class implements a menu bar for a PetrinetFrame.
MyPNMLParser
The class is derived from PNMLWopedParser and implements its abstract methods in order to build a Petri net using the application's data model classes in the package org.zurdavid.petrinets.model.
Petrinet
The class implements the IPetrinet Interface and serves as the main class to model a Petri net in the application.
PetrinetApp
The class contains the static main method, which launches the Petrinets application.
PetrinetFrame
The class represents the applications main frame.
PetrinetNode
The class is an abstract data class that implements the common properties of the two types of nodes in a Petri net: Place, Transition.
Place
The class is a data class, derived from PetrinetNode and implements properties (as well as getters and setters) which only appear in places.
PNMLWopedParser
 
PNMLWopedWriter
 
ReachabilityGraph
The class is an implementation of the interface IReachabilityGraph.
RGEdge
Reachability graph edge.
RGUpdateResult
Reachability graph update result.
TextView
The class implements the interface ITextView.
Toolbar
The class implements a toolbar for a PetrinetFrame.
Transition
The class is a data class, derived from PetrinetNode and implements properties (as well as getters and setters) which only appear in transition.
